title: Emerge
description: I thought it was over. I was wrong.Life has literally thrown me overboard and my worst fear is I won't be able to catch my breath. The people I've always relied on have betrayed me, and those that I should be afraid of have become more that I ever imagined.Will Jax, Blake, and Morgan save me or will I have to save myself?I'm surrounded by water and have two choices... sink or swim.
author: Maya Nicole
